li.label: terrible plague festival
li.description: That plague festival was botched and the mood was way off. The corpse laid there, inert, and no holy miasma was liberated from it. What a waste of time!

li.label: boring plague festival
li.description: That plague festival was repetitive and the killing technique was noticeably flawed. However the blessed plague is now among us.

li.label: satisfying plague festival
li.description: That plague festival was satisfying and a holy miasma was liberated from the corpse, bathing us all in a sacred plague wind.

li.label: spectacular plague festival
li.description: The blood! The release! That plague festival brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy and a sacred plague wind wafted from the animal's corpse, blessing us.
